Risk warning

The historical results of the strategy do not guarantee similar behavior and results in the future. Any trading involves risk and may lead to financial losses.

basic principle

A neural network searches for stable patterns, which in more than 95% of cases lead to a predictable result.

trading core

The trading core performs a huge amount of routine work that is physically impossible to do with your own hands
monitoring & execution
Continuous monitoring of a large number of instruments and markets to identify a variety of patterns
risk management
The system distributes risks by signal strength, significantly reducing possible losses
providing liquidity
The system will automatically balance the portfolio when more significant signals appear
allocation optimization
The subsystem solves the problem of distributing the available amount of funds over a large number of signals to maximize profitability.

highly diversified

Trading is distributed among a huge number of high probability patterns

trading results

Patterns themselves are stable over a long period of time. And huge diversification and optimal allocation make random deviations insignificant.

pattern results

For the possibility of third-party independent validation, patterns are published on TradingView.
*Since TradingView does not have an API for publishing, we publish only a part of the patterns to get acquainted with the results.

AI-powered

We are developing a bunch of AI-powered tools for individuals and institutional investors, such as Market monitoring, Risk hedging, and diversification robot adviser.
  • AI Market monitoring system allows us to see a trend at its beginning while being hidden from other investors and distinguish it from market-wide changes. Thus, it grants additional protection to investors from emotional trading, saves money, and preserves their wellbeings.
  • AI Risk Hedging system monitors and adjust trading positions to reduce well-correlated assets risk and risk of hidden exposition for an undesirable (risky) asset. The system achieves it by deep tracking of hidden factors that influence a given tracking instrument.
  • AI Diversification system suggests the right portfolio set according to all data from The AI Market monitoring and AI Risk Hedging systems and your risk preferences. It allows us to manage risks almost without loss of profitability while decreasing most of the market risks.
In Additional to all mentioned systems, we have more classical solutions for institutional investors, including, but not limited to automated market making for ETF (and other assets for which the fair value can be estimated), automated portfolio management, semi-automated trading assistance, security instruments tokenization, etc.

development plan

1. Centralized exchanges

2. Decentralized exchanges

terms & commissions

In order to invest in the strategy, you just need to buy a token on the Binance DEX
strategy token
The owner of the token has the right to claim a part of the capital proportionate to the number of tokens in his possession
token price
The token price is directly proportional to the total profitability and linked to the strategy results
commisions
Commission for ensuring the technical functioning of the infrastructure – 3% per year. Fee for the result – 20% of capital gains
market maker
A permanent algorithm that ensures the maintenance of the token price in accordance with the results of the strategy

how to buy a token?

To purchase a token you need an account on Binance DEX and a wallet with BUSD on the BEP2 network.

Below is a step-by-step instruction.
1. Instal Binance Wallet for your browser
2. Create a new Wallet, according to instruction
1. BUSD (for buing token)
2. BNB (for commission)
Both coins must be in the network BNB Beacon Chain (BEP2)
1. Open PRGMT / BUSD
2. Unlock your wallet
3. Create order
